name: Angular2-Express-Node-Gulp
tagline: Angular 2 - Quick start application with Express + Gulp + Type Script + Node
body:
# Angular2 Gulp, Typescript, NodeJS and Express

##Introduction

Basic Angular seed application created with Quick start application given on angular website (https://angular.io/docs/ts/latest/quickstart.html). It uses Typescript language and also added support for Express server.

## Steps to Run
```sh
    npm install
    npm build
    npm start
```

## Dependencies

1. Angular 2
2. TypeScript
3. Gulp
4. ExpressJS
5. NodeJS
6. Nodemon
7. TsLint
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
